message: Anyone remember series like Blakes Seven and Space 1999? any miss these and more??
I love Space 1999 i have all the DVD collection of the two series. My favourite is the first with Barry Morse starring DOC Victor
My favourite character as a kid was Maya. The one with the ability to morph! She was from the planet Psychon.
Yes Maya is also one of my favourite. And I love Sandra .
They just don't make them like they used too! It's all on special effects now!
